product_name: Obermeyer Aliyah Fleece Top - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When the snow starts falling, layer her up with the Obermeyer Aliyah fleece top under a warm jacket before sending her off to the ski hill. Polyester and rayon from bamboo blend is soft and warm. Internal windguard on the front partial zip keeps the chill out. Closeout.
short_description: When the snow starts falling, layer her up with the Obermeyer Aliyah fleece top under a warm jacket before sending her off to the ski hill.
